name: Munch VR
description: Help Munch become the biggest fish in the sea by grubbing your way up the food chain in a virtual reality where big eats small.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 or later Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
